abstract.p: An account of the efforts of the Russians to determine the relation of Asia and America. (Two volumes) This is the log book and official report of the first and second expeditions from 1725 - 1730 and 1733 - 1742.
[Reference: Golder, F.A. 1922. Bering's Voyages: Volume I. American Geographical Society, Research Series No. 1, American Geographical Society, Broadway at 156th Street, New York. pp. 371.]
This volume may be found at many university libraries.

descript.purpose: To record the voyages and findings of Vitus Bering.
